en: Excuse me sir... Are you the Heartsmith?
es: Disculpe... ¿Es usted el herrero de corazones?

en: You see... my heart has broken really bad, i am afraid i wont be able to love anymore
es: Verá... mi corazón se ha estropeado y me temo no poder volver a amar

en: Do you think you could fix it?
That depends a lot on you
A heart can only be fixed if it is ready to let go the sorrow
es: Un corazón sólo puede repararse si está listo para dejar atrás la pena

en: It won't be aesy, and is very dangerous, for both of us
es: No será fácil, y será peligroso para ambos

en: Are you sure you want to try it?
I have to do it. For my own good, and for the ones who still can love me
es: Debo hacerlo. Por mi bien, y por el de aquellos que aún pueden amarme
